name: Laser Game
description: Weave your way around dozens of spinning lasers to get to the next level! Touch one laser, and you're dead. Solve countless puzzles involving buttons, portals, keys, and fake doors. This game is extremely difficult, and will require all your skill and ingenuity to be beaten. So what are you waiting for? Take home your very own LASER GAME, and prepare for hours and hours of frustrating fun!
